description: This file is a C header (.h) source file containing function prototypes and macro guards for the BEEP Request Object API exports, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: BeepCreateRequest
methods.description: Creates a new BEEP Request object with provided container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: BeepReqoCreate
methods.description: Creates a BEEP Request Object with specified context and owner handles.

methods.name: BeepReqoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified BEEP Request Object.

methods.name: BeepReqoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the BEEP Request Object.
